Will there be rent or mortgage relief?

HUD is suspending foreclosures and evictions amid the coronavirus. Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac have been ordered to suspend foreclosures and evictions.

For information regarding a loan or mortgage, contact your lender directly.

Is there relief for independent contractors or self-employed individuals? 

Yes - check our website for more information on unemployment assistance and small business relief: https://t.co/gZPYtEhMWK

Why isn't Georgia closing our borders? 

Governor Kemp is allowing these decisions to be made at the local level. What is best for Atlanta may not be what is best for Hoboken.
